resources.string: Searching… Make sure that iDisplay software is running on your desktop.

"iDisplay desktop application cannot be found. Please check your network connection. If iDisplay is already installed on your desktop, please make sure that it is running. If you don't have it yet, please install for free from http://www.shape.ag/idisplay"
Below is the list of computers you can connect to. Tap to connect.
Please check your network setting and make sure that iDisplay desktop application is running
Press menu button to show menu. Select pan option from menu and drag to pan, select zoom option from menu to zoom. Tap and hold to simulate right click.
Do not show on startup again.
Connecting… Please confirm the connection in iDisplay desktop app.
Could not connect to iDisplay desktop app. Please check your network connection and make sure iDisplay desktop application is running and you can see the confirmation prompt when connecting.
Press menu button to show menu. Select pan option from menu and drag to pan, pinch to zoom. Tap and hold to simulate right click. Scroll with two fingers swipe.
Connection is successful. You may move items to secondary monitor now
Please enter valid IP and Port number.
Please enter IP address and port.
No WiFi Network found. Please check your Network Settings
Server closed connection. Probably, it is iDisplay Lite.
iDisplay has detected unknown error. Do you want to inform SHAPE about the problem (you need configured email account)?
"Please mail this to android-logs@shape.ag iDisplay log-file is attached to this email, please do not remove it."
"Have a pleasant experience! You need to have a license to register. If you don't have a license yet, select 'Try' or 'Buy Online'."
Please, enter your license code below:
"You can get your license code at http://www.shape.ag"
The license code is missing, please enter your license code.
License code is incorrect. Please check and try again.
This program is unregistered. The trial period expires on $1. To register it please visit our site www.shape.ag and purchase the license code.
Your 7-day free trial has expired. If you want to continue using iDisplay, you need to buy a license. If you have the license, please enter your license and press Register button
You have entered incorrect license code. Please check and try again.
Unknown registration error. Please go to About and send a request to our support team
"You cannot use one license on more than one device. "
Your license is intended to register another version of iDisplay or another SHAPE product.
"The license was canceled. You may have requested: 1. a refund; 2. exchange for another one. If none of these reasons apply, please click go to About and send a request to our support team."
Your license expired. If you want to continue using iDisplay please register with a valid license.
"Can't access registration server to check program availability. Please check network settings of your device and restart the program."
iDisplay is registered. Thank your for using this product.
Press menu button to show menu. Select pan option from menu and drag to pan, select zoom option from menu to zoom. Tap and hold to simulate right click.
Cannot open e-mail application to send message
Like the new iDisplay? Let others know about it by leaving a positive feedback on Android Market. Thank you!

"Trying to find the last version of iDisplay desktop application. Please make sure that it is running, and your device is connected to desktop with USB. Debugging mode enabled under Settings / Applications / Development / USB Debugging. If you don't have it yet, please install for free from %s"
Automatically connect to last known host when application started

"Hi,
Take a minute and check out iDisplay application for Android and iPhone/iPad:
Android version: http://www.shape.ag/idisplay iPhone/iPad: http://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=363500805&mt=8
Turn your Android, iPad or iPhone into a convenient side monitor for your desktop. Ideal for multi-tasking users, iDisplay lets you free the main monitor for work-related applications by moving some windows to the external display, shown on your tablet or mobile phone. iDisplay can be used for instant messaging, Twitter, displaying weather and news gadgets or other tools. Learn more on www.shape.ag/idisplay.
Sincerely,"
Could not connect to iDisplay desktop app. Please check your usb cable and make sure iDisplay desktop application is running and you can see the confirmation prompt when connecting.
Windows will detect iDisplay as secondary display with one of these virtual resolutions. Lower resolution usually results in faster image rendering and makes interactions with objects easier.
WiFi is off. Please enable WiFi in settings.
This is a link to an iDisplay log-file, please do not remove it.
"Please mail this to android-logs@shape.ag This is a link to an iDisplay log-file, please do not remove it. "
Failed to upload the iDisplay log-file.
Two fingers tap to show menu. Select pan option from menu and drag to pan, pinch to zoom. Tap and hold to simulate right click. Scroll with two fingers swipe.
Which computer do you want to connect to?
Please fill in IP address and port number of iDisplay Desktop, and give your computer a name.
"Here's how to find IP address and port on Windows:"
"-Point cursor to iDisplay icon in system tray -IP address and port number will appear on tooltip"
"Here's how to find IP address and port on Mac:"
"-Click iDisplay icon in menu bar -Click IP address and port information"
This mode is not supported on your Android. Please change iDisplay mode by clicking on iDisplay icon in status bar of your Mac and selecting a different mode.
